Title: Relates to licensing consumer debt collectors
Summary: Relates to licensing consumer debt collectors; sets minimum standards and regulations; establishes penalties for violations.
LawCode: Add Art 7 §§295 - 306, amd §§36 & 44, Bank L; amd §3218, add §5022, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to licensing consumer debt collectors
